item.title: Artifactは、リクエストしたユーザーに対してのみ、まずクリックベイトタイトルをGPT-4の見出しに置き換え、後に人間のレビュアーが新しいタイトルをデフォルトにすることもある（Mike Krieger/Artifact News）
item.description:
Mike Krieger / Artifact News:
Artifact will replace a clickbait title with a GPT-4 headline first only for users who request it, and a human reviewer may later make the new title the default  —  At Artifact, we harness the power of AI and combine it with creative product design to improve the news & content experience for our users.

item.title: WBDのJB Perretteによると、HBO Maxの顧客層の〜70％が発売後1週間でMaxに乗り換え、Maxで視聴したコンテンツの〜20％がDiscovery+のものだったという（Joe Flint/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Joe Flint / Wall Street Journal:
WBD's JB Perrette says ~70% of HBO Max's customer base switched to Max in the first week of its launch and ~20% of the content viewed on Max was from Discovery+  —  Warner Bros. Discovery said about 70% of its HBO Max customer base switched to its new Max streaming platform in the first week of its launch …

item.title: メモです：英VogueのEICエドワード・エニンフルが2024年にVogueのグローバルクリエイティブ＆カルチャーアドバイザーに就任し、英Vogueの編集コンテンツ責任者を雇う予定（Vogue Business）
item.description:
Vogue Business:
Memo: British Vogue EIC Edward Enninful plans to become Vogue's global creative and cultural advisor in 2024 and hire a British Vogue head of editorial content  —  The British Vogue editor-in-chief will become editorial advisor in 2024.  —  To receive the Vogue Business newsletter, sign up here.

item.title: YouTube、「2020年およびその他の過去の米国大統領選挙で広範な不正、エラー、不具合が発生したという虚偽の主張」を進めるコンテンツの削除を中止（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
YouTube stops removing content advancing “false claims that widespread fraud, errors, or glitches occurred in the 2020 and other past US Presidential elections”  —  In a reversal of its election integrity policy, YouTube will leave up content that says fraud …

item.title: 社内メモ：Insider CEOのHenry Blodget氏は全社員に感謝し、Insider Unionのストライキを批判、契約要求を「実行不可能」とした（Chris Roush/Talking Biz News）。
item.description:
Chris Roush / Talking Biz News:
Internal memo: Insider CEO Henry Blodget thanks all employees and criticizes the Insider Union for its strike, calling contract demands “unworkable”  —  Insider chief executive officer Henry Blodget sent out the following after its editorial staff went on strike:  —  Team,

item.title: 破産判事は、Diamond Sports Groupが試合を放映し続けるためにMLB4球団に契約金全額を支払うよう裁定、Diamondはコスト削減を求めた（Dan Caesar/St.Louis Post-Dispatch）。
item.description:
Dan Caesar / St. Louis Post-Dispatch:
A bankruptcy judge rules that Diamond Sports Group must pay four MLB teams their full contract values to keep televising games; Diamond sought to cut its costs  —  After two long days of hearings, more than nine hours on Wednesday then a session Thursday that lasted until shortly after 6:30 p.m. …

item.title: ゲッティがロンドンの高等裁判所にStable Diffusionの英国での販売停止を要請、Stability AIがゲッティの画像でAIモデルを訓練したことによる著作権侵害を非難（Sam Tobin/Reuters)
item.description:
Sam Tobin / Reuters:
Getty asks London's High Court to stop UK sales of Stable Diffusion, accusing Stability AI of copyright infringement for training its AI model on Getty's images  —  Stock photo provider Getty Images has asked London's High Court for an injunction to prevent artificial intelligence company Stability AI …

item.title: NPRニュース副社長兼エグゼクティブ・エディターのテレンス・サミュエル氏は、2023年7月10日からガネットに入社し、EICとしてUSAトゥデイを率いる予定（ガネット社）
item.description:
Gannett:
NPR News Vice President and Executive Editor Terence Samuel plans to join Gannett and lead USA Today as EIC, starting on July 10, 2023  —  Veteran leaders promoted to advance local content and journalism across the USA TODAY Network  —  Gannett Co., Inc. (NYSE: GCI) today announced veteran journalist …

item.title: 情報源はこちらTwitterのブランドセーフティと広告品質の責任者であるA.J.ブラウンが退社、今週2人目の安全性トップの退社となる（Wall Street Journal)
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: A.J. Brown, Twitter's head of brand safety and ad quality, is leaving the company, the second departure of a top safety executive this week  —  A.J. Brown's departure comes after Ella Irwin, company's head of trust and safety, left Thursday  —  Twitter lost its head of brand safety …

item.title: 情報筋の話：ジェミール・ヒルが、2019年から彼女のポッドキャスト「Jemele Hill Is Unbothered」と番組「Unbothered Network」を独占配信しているスポティファイを退社する（Bloomberg）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Jemele Hill is leaving Spotify, which has exclusively distributed her Jemele Hill Is Unbothered podcast and her Unbothered Network of shows since 2019  —  Another prominent podcaster is leaving Spotify Technology SA, as the company reverses many of its biggest investments in original audio and loses yet another Black voice.

item.title: 視聴率が下がり続け、会話と「真実」のためのフォーラムを作ろうとするCNNのクリス・リヒトの詳細なプロフィールとネットワークに対する彼のビジョン（Tim Alberta/The Atlantic)
item.description:
Tim Alberta / The Atlantic:
An in-depth profile of CNN under Chris Licht and his vision for the network, as ratings keep falling and he seeks to create a forum for conversation and “truth”  —  CEO Chris Licht felt he was on a mission to restore the network's reputation for serious journalism.  How did it all go wrong?

item.title: 情報筋の話：Netflix、Amazon、Disney、喫煙シーンに健康警告の追加を義務付けるインドの新しいタバコ規則を引き延ばすために訴訟などを検討（Reuters）
item.description:
Reuters:
Sources: Netflix, Amazon, and Disney discussed suing and other ways to stall India's new tobacco rules that require adding health warnings during smoking scenes  —  Streaming giants Netflix, Amazon and Disney on Friday privately discussed a possible legal challenge and other ways to stall India's …

item.title: Instagramの共同創業者が設立したニュース共有アプリ「Artifact」は、GPT-4モデルを使って、多くのユーザーからクリックベイトとマークされた記事の見出しを書き換える計画だ（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Artifact, the news sharing app founded by Instagram's co-founders, plans to use a GPT-4 model to rewrite article headlines marked as clickbait by many users  —  Last month, the Artifact news app introduced an option for users to flag an article as clickbait.

item.title: BBC、2023年6月27日からエラン・クロス・スティーブンスを会長代行に任命し、12ヶ月間または永久会長が任命されるまで理事会を主導する（The Guardian）
item.description:
The Guardian:
The BBC appoints Elan Closs Stephens as its acting chair starting on June 27, 2023, to lead the board for 12 months or until a permanent chair is appointed  —  BBC board member to assume role from 27 June after resignation of Richard Sharp  —  Prof Dame Elan Closs Stephens …

item.title: ネットフリックス株主、役員報酬パッケージへの支持を保留（Dawn Chmielewski/Reuters）
item.description:
Dawn Chmielewski / Reuters:
Netflix shareholders withhold support for executive pay package  —  Netflix Inc (NFLX.O) shareholders on Thursday withheld their support for the company's executive pay package, in a non-binding vote that followed a call by striking Hollywood writers to reject the proposed 2023 compensation.
